SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package Assignment

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
Assignment.Manager
public class Manager extends Object
The Manager class handles database operations for managing quiz questions. It provides methods for creating a database, managing tables, adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving questions from the database.

This class uses MySQL as the database and requires the MySQL JDBC driver.

Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kirti Kirtan Joshi

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the MySQL database.
      Returns:
      A Connection object to interact with the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • connection

      public static void connection()
      Initializes the database connection by loading the MySQL JDBC driver, creating the database if it does not exist, and creating the necessary table.

    • addQuestion

      public static int addQuestion(String difficulty, String question, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String correctAnswer)
      Adds a new question to the database.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level of the question.
      question - The question text.
      optionA - Option A.
      optionB - Option B.
      optionC - Option C.
      optionD - Option D.
      correctAnswer - The correct answer.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly inserted question.

    • updateQuestion

      public static void updateQuestion(int id, String difficulty, String question, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String correctAnswer)
      Updates an existing question in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the question to update.
      difficulty - The new difficulty level.
      question - The new question text.
      optionA - The new Option A.
      optionB - The new Option B.
      optionC - The new Option C.
      optionD - The new Option D.
      correctAnswer - The new correct answer.

    • deleteQuestion

      public static void deleteQuestion(int id)

    • loadQuestions

      public static void loadQuestions(DefaultTableModel model)
      Loads all questions from the database into a table model.
      Parameters:
      model - The table model where the data will be loaded.

    • getQuestionByDifficulty

      public static ResultSet getQuestionByDifficulty(String difficulty) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a set of random questions based on difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level (e.g., "Beginner", "Intermediate", "Advanced").
      Returns:
      A ResultSet containing the selected questions.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.
